products.title: Woven Lace Vertical Blind
products.description: With is textured finish, this verical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being simout, it will gently fileter the light entering your room when closed. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Speciality Morning Flight
products.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 280cm wide - much wider than most paterned roller blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Chenille Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: Blend style and class with durable usability with the ecowood deluxe in chenille satin, a designer-style, wooden venetian blind with a matt cream finish. This streamlined piece is backed with matching, vertical ladder tapes to hold and adjust the slats, giving further cohesion and coordination. Construct a modern design scheme in your home office, painting the walls in pale baby blue and matching the carpet to the soothing chenille satin.

A flame retardant coating, makes this sheer vertical blind a fantastic addition to your living space.

products.title: Wow Factor, Silver Crackle - Venetian Blind
products.description: The brushed silver wow factor in silver crackle is a striking, lightly textured venetian blind, crafted from heavy gauge aluminium, and with a soft, crackled effect on the surface. Use the pull-cord to adjust the slats at ease, allowing as much or as little light as you like to filter through. The attractive industriousness of the silver crackle makes for the perfect accent to a retro kitchen in a monochrome colour scheme.

products.title: Wood Effect, Provincial - Venetian Blind
products.description: Pretty and natural, the wood effect's provincial is a must-have for cool sophistication. Made from a wood-effect, heavy gauge aluminium, and formed into slim slats that can be easily adjusted, this blind is both a practical and a stylish choice. Design a light, airy, and natural-feel living room by teaming the provincial with soft creams, dark browns, and matching woods. Simple dcor is all that's required to support the provincial, as its lovely natural feel needs no excess, wherever it's placed.

products.title: Wow Factor, Dark Star - Venetian Blind
products.description: The wow factor in dark star unites charcoal grey with a pretty, shimmering silver, on heavy gauge aluminium slats that are easily adjustable to change the light content of the room. These unique features make this blind an obvious choice when choosing a stylish venetian blind. Using the dark star in a teenager's bedroom will provide grown-up style, with the glistening dark silver showing attitude and fun.
